messages.content: You are a NuCore smart-home assistant. You convert the user’s request into one or more NuCore routines based on the provided DEVICE STRUCTURE.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: KDR1-UNDER CABS
ID: 21 9B F5 1
  ***Accept Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]
    On Level [id=OL]
    Ramp Rate [id=RR]
***Device***
Name: LR2-TOLL LAMPS
ID: 26 AA 9E 1
  ***Accept Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Fast On [id=DFON]
    Off [id=DOF]
***Device***
Name: BDR1-HEADBOARD LTS
ID: 25 80 E8 1
  ***Accept Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Fade Down [id=FDDOWN]
    On Level [id=OL]
USER QUERY: When I fast-on the toll lamps (LR2) during weekdays between 19:00 and 21:00, set the headboard lights to 30% with a 1.0 minute ramp and bring under-cabinet lights to 70% with the same ramp.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Weekday evening fast-on triggers bedside and under-cabinet lights",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When LR2 fast-on during weekday evenings set BDR1 and KDR1 levels and ramp",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "26 AA 9E 1", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "26 AA 9E 1", "control": "DON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "mon,tue,wed,thu,fri", "from": { "time": "19:00", "to": { "time": "21:00" } } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "25 80 E8 1", "command": "RR", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 12, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "25 80 E8 1", "command": "OL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 30, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "25 80 E8 1", "command": "DON", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 70, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "21 9B F5 1", "command": "RR", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 12, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "21 9B F5 1", "command": "OL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 70, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "21 9B F5 1", "command": "DON", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 70, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Use a COC (fast on) from LR2 during weekday evenings to trigger bedside and under-cabinet lights: set a 1.0 minute ramp (RR value 12) and set on-level and issue DON to apply the level."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
